body: Thanks! Indeed this can be replaced by `flatten_indices()`, but for some reason it gets slower after the replacement (1.38 ms ± 179 µs after replacement vs 594 µs ± 68.9 µs before it). I will keep the current implementation and note down what the current code is trying to do
